directions.text: Grate squash down to 2 cups worth.
Blend eggs while adding oil, sugar, squash and vanilla until smooth.
Shift together the flour, baking powder, cinnamon and salt.
Blend the flour mixture into the wet mixture.
Chop nuts up and fold into mixture.
Grease two 8.5 x 4.5" loaf pans and pour mixture evenly between the two.
